data.name: Amborettio
data.detailed_description:
=============================================================================================================================
Developed independently over the course of 4 months, Amborettio seeks to tell the tale of a world ravaged by strife.
=============================================================================================================================
In the year 2027, a pandemic raged across the world, destabilizing the lives of all. Through ignorance and gross incompetence, the pandemic became politicized, and what resulted became known as the greatest tragedy in human history…
=============================================================================================================================
Play as a C.A.N. inhabitant who has just been released from cryogenic stasis 200 years after the atomic annihilation of the United States.

Your directives are clear: procure materials for the faction known as the Peace Keepers, aiding them in their mission to rebuild the surface world.

Craft, enhance tools/equipment, and establish your character's sense of S.E.L.F. within the post-apocalyptic caverns of the United States.

Explore the Void, a new location featuring reactive NPCs that allow you to purchase items, sell enemy souls, and hire guards.
=============================================================================================================================
Craft electrical components, gunpowder, power cells, torches, repair kits, weapon upgrade parts, tool upgrade parts, high-tech components, scavenger robots, and mining robots.

Allocate points to S.trength to enhance your character's carry weight.
Allocate points to E.ndurance to enhance your character's HP regeneration.
Allocate points to L.ongevity to enhance your character's SP regeneration.
Allocate points to F.ortune to enhance your character's mystery ore bag drop rates.

S.E.L.F. tabs have a chance to drop from enemies, can be found in troves throughout the caverns, and can be bought within the Void. These tabs permanently enhance your character's S.E.L.F. upon acquisition.
=============================================================================================================================
Progression in Amborettio is near-limitless, meaning that you can endlessly level-up, allocate S.E.L.F. points, and enhance your weapon and turrets. Tool enhancement remains capped at level 100, but will provide more than enough resources at this level.

While in-game guides exist, Amborettio is nonlinear. There are many different ways you can achieve your goals and there is plenty of variety available for your character's S.E.L.F. build. Additionally, the in-game particle relay allows players to endlessly teleport to new and unexplored caverns, granting infinite mining ability and troves to explore.

By donating materials to the Peace Keepers, you unveil letters to three puzzles. Solving all three puzzles will uncover the truth about what happened on the day of the bombings, and will grant a special reward...
=============================================================================================================================

data.short_description: Amborettio is a post-apocalyptic mining/survival RPG with a focus on crafting, equipment upgrades, and resource management. Mine, craft, and fight your way through the caverns as you try to uncover the truth about the PR0T3CH coalition's goals.
data.reviews:
“I liked the game. I advise you to try to play. As for me, very cool!”
RED GUNNER

“very entertaining, the theme of the game as it is a platform game and as you advance you open new levels with different difficulty.”
Latinos Gaming

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-7100U CPU @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs) ~2.4GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game displays best at 1920x1080 resolution or higher, resolutions below 1280x720 cannot be supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1400 Quad-Core Processor (8 CPUs) ~3.2GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game displays best at 1920x1080 resolution or higher, resolutions below 1280x720 cannot be supported.

content_descriptors.notes: Projectile collision results in blood spatter, complimented by some gruesome death sounds.
